otherNames: Blue Seed 2: Operation Mitama, Blue Seed OVA, Blue Seed Beyond, ブルーシード 2
synopsis: A renegade scientist in San Francisco has found a way to create a new creature called a Neo-Aragami without the power of Susanoo. When these monsters start to terrorize California, the U.S. turns to the old members of the Terrestrial Administration Center (TAC) for help.
